Articles.Content:
Hello everyone,

At this very moment I'm digging through CFG files editing them so they use more realistic fuels and values.

Well my question to you is what do you think each in-game engines real life counterpart be.

Thanks

Unless you or doing this for your own enjoyment why not use ISP Difficulty Scaler?

It changes the maximum thrust at different pressures instead of the stock fuel consumption.

Edit: Forgot to add there is also a mod that changes the fuel. I think it is called Real Fuels or something similar.

Edited December 20, 2014 by WOODY01

Yeah I'm doing this for myself and I wanted to make real fuels my self as this save will be all stock except for my modification and void

I also wanted to see what people thought what stock engines matched the look of a real life engine
